attributes.action: Investigation into the BBC reporting on the Israel and Palestine conflict.
attributes.background: An independent body to carry out an investigation into the BBC reporting and interviewing questioning on the conflict between Palestine and Israel. They are being extremely bias towards the Palestinians people.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The BBC is editorially independent of the Government and Parliament.  You might want to contact either the BBC or Ofcom with your concerns:

https://www.ofcom.org.uk/home
